title: ii-c) The flats constructed under the free sale component shall be first offered to the Central Government, its statutory bodies, Central / State PSUs for purchase as staff quarters and if the Central Government or its statutory Bodies or Central / State PSUs do not indicate willingness to purchase the same within the prescribed time limit, such flats shall be sold in open market
clause_text: ii-c) The flats constructed under the free sale component shall be first offered to the Central Government, its statutory bodies, Central / State PSUs for purchase as staff quarters and if the Central Government or its statutory Bodies or Central / State PSUs do not indicate willingness to purchase the same within the prescribed time limit, such flats shall be sold in open market.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets
